original_title: Governor C.C. Young Hails Greater Talkie Season
overview: Ronald Colman introduces the governor of California, who urges moviegoers to attend the cleaner, wholesome talkie films, rather than those that show the seamy side of life. Doing this will show movie company executives that the public prefers them, and more of them will be produced.
title: Governor C.C. Young Hails Greater Talkie Season
